name: Melted Wheel Of Cheese Foods!
description:
A new cooking addiction for all foodies who are obsessed with cheesy food and love DIY cooking games! Do you like mouthwatering stringy hot melting cheese on your favorite food dishes? If yes then this new trendy cooking game will not only tickle your taste buds with its delicious hot melting cheesy foods made with Raclette including cheesy potatoes, mouth melting cheese pasta, hot cheese burger and loaded cheese fries. Scrape & drop melting stringy cheese from the wheel of cheese by warming it on heater grill and dropping the melting strings of cheese on your favorite foods and taking the cheese foods to another level. This new cooking game with an amazing cheesy experience will take and foodie out of world. We couldn’t resist eating cheese after playing this game can you?

Melted wheel of Cheese Foods Menu:
Yummy Swiss Raclette Dishes
Delicious & Juicy Cheese Burgers
Mouth Melting Cheesy Italian Pasta
Mouthwatering & Stringy Loaded Cheese Fries
Cheese Wheel Pasta
And amazing Fast Foods
Enjoy glorious cheesy goodness by downloading this new cooking sensation full of cheesy foods and enjoy!
